description: This file contains OEM/SOC specific platform configuration functions for network bridge operations, including pre- and post-configuration hooks for bridge instances, as well as a platform-specific interface retrieval function.

methods.name: int HandlePreConfigVendor(bridgeDetails * bridgeInfo,int InstanceNumber)
methods.description: Performs platform-specific operations before creating, updating, or deleting a bridge, based on instance number.

methods.name: int HandlePostConfigVendor(bridgeDetails * bridgeInfo,int InstanceNumber)
methods.description: Performs platform-specific operations after creating, updating, or deleting a bridge, based on instance number.

methods.name: char * getVendorIfaces()
methods.description: Returns NULL; placeholder for platform-specific interface retrieval.
